Package org.jboss.netty.channel.xnio

An alternative channel API implementation which uses JBoss XNIO as its I/O provider.

See:
          Description


Interface Summary
XnioChannel A Channel which uses JBoss XNIO as its I/O provider.
XnioChannelConfig A ChannelConfig for an XnioChannel.
XnioServerChannel A ServerChannel which uses JBoss XNIO as its I/O provider.
 

Class Summary
XnioAcceptedChannelHandlerFactory An XNIO IoHandlerFactory implementation that must be specified when you create a BoundServer to integrate XNIO into Netty.
XnioClientChannelFactory A client-side ChannelFactory which uses JBoss XNIO as its I/O provider.
XnioServerChannelFactory A ServerChannelFactory which uses JBoss XNIO as its I/O provider.
 

Package org.jboss.netty.channel.xnio Description

An alternative channel API implementation which uses JBoss XNIO as its I/O provider.
